Detailed Description

Symbol table class xtcc/xtcc/qscript/stubs/simple_compiler/common.h.

Copyright (C) 2002, 2003, 2004, 2005, 2006, 2007, 2008, 2009 Neil Xavier D'Souza

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum datatype

datatype enum: This enum is used to mark the type of a statement and the type of a variable and the type of an expression

enum question_type

question_type enum: A question can be single code, multicoded or numeric (which I havent yet added to the grammar)

enum type_qualifier

type_qualifier enum: used for marking variables as constant for example: const int BUFSIZE=1024;

Function Documentation

bool check_type_compat ( datatype  typ1,
datatype  typ2 
)

This helper function will evaluate 2 types for compatibility. For example an INT8_TYPE and a INT8_ARR_TYPE are not compatible this is used to determine if a type promotion is possible or the compiler should signal a type error
